name: Zaniah Contagion
description:
Zaniah Contagion is a prototype game developed between 26 Aug - 2 Sept for Epic MegaJam 2021.

Game:
Escape from the deadly contagion of bizarre organisms and eerie flora. Navigate and dash through narrow corridors and large sci-fi halls in this endless runner style of gameplay.

Controls:

W A S D - Movement
Shift - Quick Dash (can be performed up to 3 times with a 2.5 seconds of cooldown for recharge).
Space - Jump

Objective:

Stay out of the infested area or it makes you take damage. Run and keep out of the infestation and see how long you can survive. Share your highest score below!

Development:

The game was created by a team of 3 people.

All assets are original and were created specifically for this jam. The only exception is the Unreal Mannequin. We got her and her animations from the Unreal starter packs provided by Epic.

Our team: (team name is ZaniDev)

Christina Vangou - 3D Artist

Miroslav Dimitrov - Programmer

Peter Dimitrov - 3D Artist.

You can find more about Christinas' work over at her Artstation here. If you want to find more about Miro, be sure to check his Linkedin here. Petes' artwork can be found here. You can also find him on Twitter.

We had a lot of fun taking part in this jam! We also had a lot of fun making this short game and we learnt a lot from it. We hope you experienced that too.
